job.title: Software Developer / Software Engineer / Web API Developer
job.description:
At SchoolPass, we're changing the way schools think about campus movement and wellness. Parents love using SchoolPass to communicate wellness, attendance, and dismissal changes to everyone at the school with the tap of a button, and schools love using SchoolPass to streamline their dismissal process and make sure every kid goes where they're supposed to at the end of the day.
We're headquartered in the Greater DC Area, and we have customers in 36 states from California to New York. Our work is dynamic, responsive, and stimulating.
We are looking for a remote, full-time Software Engineer with web API backend experience to join our API and Integrations team. We build and maintain web APIs and build integrations between our APIs and Third Party APIs.
What you will do
Work in a small, fully-remote, multi-functional team that maintains the systems at the core of our business
Understand the full technology stack and how all the pieces fit together
Deliver testable, maintainable, and high-quality code
Share knowledge, promote best practices, and collaborate with other engineers
Develop and deploy web APIs and integrations with web APIs
Take operational responsibility for the services we deploy
What we are looking for
You have 3+ years of Object Oriented programming languages and best practices with experience in or a desire to learn C#
You have experience building web APIs built on top of MVC Frameworks
You are familiar with SQL based databases
You are comfortable running your software in Windows environments
You are interested in keeping up with current best practices in your areas of expertise
Our Technology Stack
We have a TypeScript/Angular web application and several Xamarin (C#) Mobile Apps for our Front End
We use ASP.NET Core MVC (C#) back end communicating with a relational database through Entity Framework
We also have a MVC Web App we are transitioning to the Angular site
We use Amazon Web Services
We use Microsoft's Azure Devops and custom solutions for integration, deployment, and project management
Job Type: Full-time
Pay: $106,000.00 - $126,000.00 per year
Benefits:
Dental insurance

Vision insurance
Schedule:
Monday to Friday

Signing bonus

Bachelor's (Preferred)

Web API: 3 years (Preferred)
